"Once upon a time, there was a mythical land where it was always summer. We were happy. We wanted for nothing." Prime Video has revealed a teaser trailer for a new streaming series called We Were Liars, about teens & trouble on their own private island. The story of a 17 year old girl from a wealthy family. Cady Sinclair spends her summers on a private island. After a terrible accident she struggles to remember events that happened in her past. We Were Liars is adapted from the same book written by E. Lockhart. "Want for nothing. Except the truth." A 17-year-old girl who survived a horrible accident at her family's summer home two years ago that she cannot remember. She returns, determined to remember the details of her accident but as the pieces start to come together, she discovers not only the painful truth of that night, but a shocking revelation about herself. Starring “the Liars” Emily Alyn Lind as Cadence Sinclair Eastman, Shubham Maheshwari as Gat Patil, Esther McGregor as Mirren Sinclair Sheffield, Joseph Zada as Johnny; plus Caitlin FitzGerald, Mamie Gummer, Candice King, Rahul Kohi, David Morse. Check it out below.

Here's the first look teaser for Prime Video's series We Were Liars, direct from PV's YouTube:

Based on the best-selling novel titled "We Were Liars" written by E. Lockhart, We Were Liars, the series follows Cadence Sinclair Eastman (Emily Alyn Lind) and her tight-knit inner circle, nicknamed 'the Liars,' during their summer escapades vacationing on their grandfather’s New England private island. On the surface the Sinclair family is known for their good looks, generational wealth, and close familial bond, but after a life-altering accident, everyone, not just the Liars, seems to have something to hide. We Were Liars is a series written and executive produced by the two co-showrunners Julie Plec (of The Vampire Diaries, Legacies) and Carina Adly MacKenzie (of Roswell, New Mexico, The Originals). Adapted from the book of the same name by E. Lockhart. With episodes directed by Erica Dunton and Nzingha Stewart. Executive produced by Julie Plec, Carina Adly MacKenzie, Emily Cummins, E. Lockhart. Amazon will debut We Were Liars streaming on Prime Video starting June 18th, 2025 this summer. Anyone interested in this series?
